author_blurb.en: Translated for SuttaCentral by Bhikkhu Sujato, 2018. Dedicated to the public domain via Creative Commons Zero (CC0). You are encouraged to copy, reproduce, adapt, alter, or otherwise make use of this translation in any way you wish. Attribution is appreciated but not legally required.

segments.pli: Aṅguttara Nikāya 5
segments.en: Numbered Discourses 5

segments.pli: 3. Pañcaṅgikavagga
segments.en: 3. With Five Factors

segments.pli: 24. Dussīlasutta
segments.en: 24. Unethical

segments.pli: “Dussīlassa, bhikkhave, sīlavipannassa hatūpaniso hoti sammāsamādhi;
segments.en: “Mendicants, an unethical person, who lacks ethics, has destroyed a vital condition for right immersion.

segments.pli: sammāsamādhimhi asati sammāsamādhivipannassa hatūpanisaṃ hoti yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṃ;
segments.en: When there is no right immersion, one who lacks right immersion has destroyed a vital condition for true knowledge and vision.

segments.pli: yathābhūtañāṇadassane asati yathābhūtañāṇadassanavipannassa hatūpaniso hoti nibbidāvirāgo;
segments.en: When there is no true knowledge and vision, one who lacks true knowledge and vision has destroyed a vital condition for disillusionment and dispassion.

segments.pli: nibbidāvirāge asati nibbidāvirāgavipannassa hatūpanisaṃ hoti vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ.
segments.en: When there is no disillusionment and dispassion, one who lacks disillusionment and dispassion has destroyed a vital condition for knowledge and vision of freedom.

segments.pli: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, rukkho sākhāpalāsavipanno.
segments.en: Suppose there was a tree that lacked branches and foliage.

segments.pli: Tassa papaṭikāpi na pāripūriṃ gacchati, tacopi na pāripūriṃ gacchati, pheggupi na pāripūriṃ gacchati, sāropi na pāripūriṃ gacchati;
segments.en: Its shoots, bark, softwood, and heartwood would not grow to fullness.

segments.pli: evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, dussīlassa sīlavipannassa hatūpaniso hoti sammāsamādhi;
segments.en: In the same way, an unethical person, who lacks ethics, has destroyed a vital condition for right immersion.

segments.pli: sammāsamādhimhi asati sammāsamādhivipannassa hatūpanisaṃ hoti yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṃ;
segments.en: When there is no right immersion, one who lacks right immersion has destroyed a vital condition for true knowledge and vision.

segments.pli: yathābhūtañāṇadassane asati yathābhūtañāṇadassanavipannassa hatūpaniso hoti nibbidāvirāgo;
segments.en: When there is no true knowledge and vision, one who lacks true knowledge and vision has destroyed a vital condition for disillusionment and dispassion.

segments.pli: nibbidāvirāge asati nibbidāvirāgavipannassa hatūpanisaṃ hoti vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ.
segments.en: When there is no disillusionment and dispassion, one who lacks disillusionment and dispassion has destroyed a vital condition for knowledge and vision of freedom.

segments.pli: Sīlavato, bhikkhave, sīlasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti sammāsamādhi;
segments.en: An ethical person, who has fulfilled ethics, has fulfilled a vital condition for right immersion.

segments.pli: sammāsamādhimhi sati sammāsamādhisampannassa upanisasampannaṃ hoti yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṃ;
segments.en: When there is right immersion, one who has fulfilled right immersion has fulfilled a vital condition for true knowledge and vision.

segments.pli: yathābhūtañāṇadassane sati yathābhūtañāṇadassanasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti nibbidāvirāgo;
segments.en: When there is true knowledge and vision, one who has fulfilled true knowledge and vision has fulfilled a vital condition for disillusionment and dispassion.

segments.pli: nibbidāvirāge sati nibbidāvirāgasampannassa upanisasampannaṃ hoti vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ.
segments.en: When there is disillusionment and dispassion, one who has fulfilled disillusionment and dispassion has fulfilled a vital condition for knowledge and vision of freedom.

segments.pli: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, rukkho sākhāpalāsasampanno. Tassa papaṭikāpi pāripūriṃ gacchati, tacopi pāripūriṃ gacchati, pheggupi pāripūriṃ gacchati, sāropi pāripūriṃ gacchati;
segments.en: Suppose there was a tree that was complete with branches and foliage. Its shoots, bark, softwood, and heartwood would all grow to fullness.

segments.pli: evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, sīlavato sīlasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti sammāsamādhi;
segments.en: In the same way, an ethical person, who has fulfilled ethics, has fulfilled a vital condition for right immersion.

segments.pli: sammāsamādhimhi sati sammāsamādhisampannassa upanisasampannaṃ hoti yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṃ;
segments.en: When there is right immersion, one who has fulfilled right immersion has fulfilled a vital condition for true knowledge and vision.

segments.pli: yathābhūtañāṇadassane sati yathābhūtañāṇadassanasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti nibbidāvirāgo;
segments.en: When there is true knowledge and vision, one who has fulfilled true knowledge and vision has fulfilled a vital condition for disillusionment and dispassion.

segments.pli: nibbidāvirāge sati nibbidāvirāgasampannassa upanisasampannaṃ hoti vimuttiñāṇadassanan”ti.
segments.en: When there is disillusionment and dispassion, one who has fulfilled disillusionment and dispassion has fulfilled a vital condition for knowledge and vision of freedom.”

segments.pli: Catutthaṃ.

sections.title: “Mendicants, an unethical person, who lacks ethics, has destroyed…

suttaplex.blurb: Dharmas starting with morality naturally evolve to freedom.
